name: filter_string_data
description: Filter rows from an Excel or CSV file based on one or more string-matching conditions applied to a string column.

file_path.description: Path to the Excel or CSV file.

sheet_name.description: Name or index of the Excel sheet to read. Ignored for CSV files.

column_name.description: The string column on which to apply the filtering conditions.

thresholds.description: List of threshold values to match against the column.

conditions.description: List of conditions to apply to each threshold. Must match the length of thresholds.

logical_operator.description: Logical operator used to combine multiple filter conditions.

save_as.description: Optional path to save the filtered results as a .csv or .xlsx file.
